Feats.Name: Ability Improvement
Feats.Description: Increase one ability by 2 or two abilities by 1 (max 20).

Features.Name: Ability Score Improvement
Features.Description: Increase your ability scores.

Feats.Name: Actor
Feats.Description: +1 Charisma. Expertise in Deception and Performance (also grants proficiency if not already proficient).

Features.Name: Actor
Features.Description: Your Charisma increases by 1. You gain expertise in Deception and Performance.

Feats.Name: Alert
Feats.Description: +5 initiative; cannot be Surprised.

Features.Name: Alert
Features.Description: +5 to initiative; cannot be Surprised.

Feats.Name: Athlete
Feats.Description: +1 Strength or Dexterity. Standing from Prone costs less movement. Jump distance increased by 50%.

Features.Name: Athlete
Features.Description: +1 Strength or Dexterity. Standing from Prone uses less movement. Jump distance increased by 50%.

Feats.Name: Charger
Feats.Description: Grants Charge Weapon Attack and Charge Shove actions without provoking opportunity attacks.

Features.Name: Charger
Features.Description: Gain access to Charge Weapon Attack and Charge Shove actions. Charging does not provoke opportunity attacks.

Feats.Name: Crossbow Expert
Feats.Description: No disadvantage on ranged attacks in close range for crossbows. Bonus action hand crossbow attack.

Features.Name: Crossbow Expert
Features.Description: You can fire crossbows at point-blank range without disadvantage. After making a ranged attack with a hand crossbow, you can make another as a bonus action.

Feats.Name: Defensive Duellist
Feats.Description: Reaction to add proficiency bonus to AC vs melee attack when wielding finesse weapon.

Features.Name: Defensive Duellist
Features.Description: When wielding a finesse weapon, use your reaction to increase your AC by your proficiency bonus against one melee attack.

Feats.Name: Dual Wielder
Feats.Description: +1 AC while dual-wielding. Can dual-wield non-light one-handed weapons.

Features.Name: Dual Wielder
Features.Description: +1 AC while wielding two melee weapons. You can dual-wield weapons that aren't Light.

Feats.Name: Dungeon Delver
Feats.Description: Advantage on Perception/Investigation to detect traps. Advantage on saves vs traps. Resistance to trap damage.

Features.Name: Dungeon Delver
Features.Description: Advantage on Perception and Investigation checks to detect secret doors and traps. Advantage on saving throws against traps. Resistance to damage from traps.

Feats.Name: Durable
Feats.Description: +1 Constitution. Minimum healing is max(heal_amount, 2+CON modifier).

Features.Name: Durable
Features.Description: +1 Constitution. When you regain hit points, the minimum you can heal is 2 + your Constitution modifier.

Feats.Name: Elemental Adept
Feats.Description: Choose a damage type. Your spells ignore resistance to that damage type. Treat 1s as 2s on damage dice.

Features.Name: Elemental Adept
Features.Description: Choose a damage type (Fire, Cold, Lightning, Thunder, or Acid). Your spells ignore resistance to that damage type. When you roll damage for a spell, treat any 1 on a damage die as a 2.

Feats.Name: Great Weapon Master
Feats.Description: Bonus action attack on critical hit or kill. Toggle: -5 to hit for +10 damage with heavy/two-handed weapons.

Features.Name: Great Weapon Master
Features.Description: When you score a critical hit or reduce a creature to 0 hit points with a melee weapon attack, you can make another melee weapon attack as a bonus action. You can take a -5 penalty to attack rolls with heavy weapons to gain +10 to damage.

Feats.Name: Heavily Armoured
Feats.Description: +1 Strength. Heavy Armour proficiency.

Features.Name: Heavily Armoured
Features.Description: +1 Strength. You gain proficiency with Heavy Armour.

Feats.Name: Heavy Armour Master
Feats.Description: +1 Strength. Reduce incoming non-magical physical damage by 3 while wearing heavy armor.

Features.Name: Heavy Armour Master
Features.Description: +1 Strength. While wearing heavy armour, you reduce non-magical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage by 3.

Feats.Name: Lightly Armoured
Feats.Description: +1 Strength or Dexterity. Light Armour proficiency.

Features.Name: Lightly Armoured
Features.Description: +1 Strength or Dexterity. You gain proficiency with Light Armour.

Feats.Name: Lucky
Feats.Description: 3 Luck Points per long rest. Use to gain advantage on attacks/checks/saves or force enemy reroll.

Features.Name: Lucky
Features.Description: You have 3 Luck Points. You can spend a Luck Point to gain Advantage on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, or to impose Disadvantage on an enemy's attack roll against you.

Feats.Name: Mage Slayer
Feats.Description: Advantage on saves vs spells within melee range. Reaction attack on spellcast in melee. Target has disadvantage on concentration saves from your attacks.

Features.Name: Mage Slayer
Features.Description: You have Advantage on saving throws against spells cast by creatures within melee range. When a creature within melee range casts a spell, you can use your reaction to make a weapon attack. Your attacks give the target Disadvantage on concentration saving throws.

Feats.Name: Magic Initiate: Bard
Feats.Description: Learn 2 cantrips and 1 level 1 spell from the Bard spell list. You can cast the spell once per long rest. Your spellcasting ability is Charisma.

Features.Name: Magic Initiate: Bard
Features.Description: Learn 2 cantrips and 1 level 1 spell from the Bard spell list. You can cast the level 1 spell once per long rest without expending a spell slot. Your spellcasting ability is Charisma.

Feats.Name: Magic Initiate: Cleric
Feats.Description: Learn 2 cantrips and 1 level 1 spell from the Cleric spell list. You can cast the spell once per long rest. Your spellcasting ability is Wisdom.

Features.Name: Magic Initiate: Cleric
Features.Description: Learn 2 cantrips and 1 level 1 spell from the Cleric spell list. You can cast the level 1 spell once per long rest without expending a spell slot. Your spellcasting ability is Wisdom.

Feats.Name: Magic Initiate: Druid
Feats.Description: Learn 2 cantrips and 1 level 1 spell from the Druid spell list. You can cast the spell once per long rest. Your spellcasting ability is Wisdom.

Features.Name: Magic Initiate: Druid
Features.Description: Learn 2 cantrips and 1 level 1 spell from the Druid spell list. You can cast the level 1 spell once per long rest without expending a spell slot. Your spellcasting ability is Wisdom.

Feats.Name: Magic Initiate: Sorcerer
Feats.Description: Learn 2 cantrips and 1 level 1 spell from the Sorcerer spell list. You can cast the spell once per long rest. Your spellcasting ability is Charisma.

Features.Name: Magic Initiate: Sorcerer
Features.Description: Learn 2 cantrips and 1 level 1 spell from the Sorcerer spell list. You can cast the level 1 spell once per long rest without expending a spell slot. Your spellcasting ability is Charisma.

Feats.Name: Magic Initiate: Warlock
Feats.Description: Learn 2 cantrips and 1 level 1 spell from the Warlock spell list. You can cast the spell once per long rest. Your spellcasting ability is Charisma.

Features.Name: Magic Initiate: Warlock
Features.Description: Learn 2 cantrips and 1 level 1 spell from the Warlock spell list. You can cast the level 1 spell once per long rest without expending a spell slot. Your spellcasting ability is Charisma.

Feats.Name: Magic Initiate: Wizard
Feats.Description: Learn 2 cantrips and 1 level 1 spell from the Wizard spell list. You can cast the spell once per long rest. Your spellcasting ability is Intelligence.

Features.Name: Magic Initiate: Wizard
Features.Description: Learn 2 cantrips and 1 level 1 spell from the Wizard spell list. You can cast the level 1 spell once per long rest without expending a spell slot. Your spellcasting ability is Intelligence.

Feats.Name: Martial Adept
Feats.Description: Learn 2 Battle Master maneuvers. Gain 1 superiority die (d6) that recovers on short rest.

Features.Name: Martial Adept
Features.Description: You learn two maneuvers from the Battle Master archetype. You gain one superiority die (a d6) which is used to fuel your maneuvers and is regained after a short or long rest.

Feats.Name: Medium Armour Master
Feats.Description: No Stealth disadvantage in medium armor. +3 DEX to AC instead of +2.

Features.Name: Medium Armour Master
Features.Description: Wearing medium armour doesn't impose Disadvantage on your Stealth checks. When wearing medium armour, you can add up to 3 to your AC if you have 14+ Dexterity (instead of 2).

Feats.Name: Mobile
Feats.Description: +3m movement speed. Difficult terrain doesn't slow you after Dash. No opportunity attacks from melee targets you attack.

Features.Name: Mobile
Features.Description: Your movement speed increases by 3m. Difficult terrain doesn't slow you down when you use the Dash action. When you make a melee attack against a creature, you don't provoke opportunity attacks from that creature for the rest of the turn.

Feats.Name: Moderately Armoured
Feats.Description: +1 Strength or Dexterity. Medium armor and Shield proficiency.

Features.Name: Moderately Armoured
Features.Description: +1 Strength or Dexterity. You gain proficiency with Medium Armour and Shields.

Feats.Name: Performer
Feats.Description: +1 Charisma. Musical Instrument proficiency.

Features.Name: Performer
Features.Description: +1 Charisma. You gain proficiency with Musical Instruments.

Feats.Name: Polearm Master
Feats.Description: Bonus action butt attack with polearms. Opportunity attack when creatures enter your reach.

Features.Name: Polearm Master
Features.Description: When wielding a quarterstaff, spear, or polearm, you can use a bonus action to make a melee attack with the opposite end of the weapon. Creatures entering your reach provoke opportunity attacks.

Feats.Name: Resilient
Feats.Description: +1 to chosen ability. Proficiency in that ability's saving throw.

Features.Name: Resilient
Features.Description: Choose an ability score. You gain +1 to that ability and proficiency in saving throws using that ability.

Feats.Name: Ritual Caster
Feats.Description: Learn 2 ritual spells.

Features.Name: Ritual Caster
Features.Description: You learn two ritual spells of your choice. You can cast these spells as rituals.

Feats.Name: Savage Attacker
Feats.Description: Roll melee damage dice twice and use the higher result.

Features.Name: Savage Attacker
Features.Description: When making melee weapon attacks, you roll the weapon's damage dice twice and use the higher roll.

Feats.Name: Sentinel
Feats.Description: Reaction attack when enemy attacks ally nearby. Opportunity attacks reduce target speed to 0. Advantage on opportunity attacks.

Features.Name: Sentinel
Features.Description: When a creature within melee range attacks a target other than you, you can use your reaction to make a weapon attack against that creature. Your opportunity attacks reduce the target's speed to 0 for the rest of the turn. You make opportunity attacks with Advantage.

Feats.Name: Sharpshooter
Feats.Description: Ignore low ground penalty. Toggle: -5 to hit for +10 damage with ranged weapons.

Features.Name: Sharpshooter
Features.Description: Your ranged weapon attacks ignore low ground penalties. You can take a -5 penalty to ranged attack rolls to gain +10 to damage.

Feats.Name: Shield Master
Feats.Description: +2 to Dexterity saves with shield. Reaction to halve AoE spell damage (none on success).

Features.Name: Shield Master
Features.Description: When wielding a shield, you gain +2 to Dexterity saving throws. You can use your reaction to halve damage from area-of-effect spells that target only you (no damage on successful save).

Feats.Name: Skilled
Feats.Description: Proficiency in 3 skills of your choice.

Features.Name: Skilled
Features.Description: You gain proficiency in any combination of 3 skills of your choice.

Feats.Name: Spell Sniper
Feats.Description: Learn 1 cantrip. Critical hit threshold reduced by 1 for spell attacks.

Features.Name: Spell Sniper
Features.Description: Learn one cantrip that requires an attack roll. Your critical hit threshold for spell attacks is reduced by 1.

Feats.Name: Tavern Brawler
Feats.Description: +1 Strength or Constitution. Double Strength modifier on unarmed/improvised attacks and throws.

Features.Name: Tavern Brawler
Features.Description: +1 Strength or Constitution. Your unarmed strikes and improvised weapon attacks deal additional damage equal to your Strength modifier. You add double your Strength modifier to damage when throwing objects or creatures.

Feats.Name: Tough
Feats.Description: +2 hit points per level.

Features.Name: Tough
Features.Description: Your hit point maximum increases by 2 for each level you have gained.

Feats.Name: War Caster
Feats.Description: Advantage on concentration saves. Can use Shocking Grasp as a reaction when an enemy triggers an opportunity attack.

Features.Name: War Caster
Features.Description: You have Advantage on Constitution saving throws to maintain concentration on spells. When a hostile creature's movement provokes an opportunity attack from you, you can use your reaction to cast Shocking Grasp at the creature.

Feats.Name: Weapon Master
Feats.Description: +1 Strength or Dexterity. Proficiency with 4 weapon types of your choice.

Features.Name: Weapon Master
Features.Description: +1 Strength or Dexterity. You gain proficiency with 4 weapons of your choice.
